mapper.insert: insert into tbl_time(use_id, time_start, time_end) select #{use_id}, now(), null from dual where not exists ( select 1 from tbl_time where date(time_start) = curdate() ) limit 1;
mapper.update: update tbl_time set time_end = now() where use_id = #{use_id} and time_end is null and DATE(time_start) = CURDATE()
mapper.select: SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(time_start, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") AS start, DATE_FORMAT(time_end, "%H:%i") AS end FROM tbl_time where use_id = #{use_id} order by time_code desc;
